name: OtakuFriend
0:
”Alexa, open Otaku Friend”
”what are the news about anime?”
”give me manga trends”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: otaku friend
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Are you bored? You don't know what to see? Ask your otaku friend to stay up to date on the latest trends in the otaku world.

Ask your Friend Otaku for the latest anime or manga trends.

Surprise your friends with your knowledge about the latest anime or manga and enjoy your favorite hobby!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
